items.name: Component_StackLayoutBehavior
items.content:
# =================================================================== # # Script: Component_StackLayoutBehavior # # $$COPYRIGHT$$ # # =================================================================== class Component_StackLayoutBehavior extends gs.Component_LayoutBehavior ###* * Turns a game object into a stack-layout and layouts all sub-objects * like stack vertically or horizontally. The game object needs a * container-component. *
* The sub-objects in a stack-layout can be configured as resizable or * non-resizable(fixed-size). For example:
*
* Lets say we have a layout-size of 500px in width with three controls.
*
* | 80px | dynamic | 80px |
*
* Two controls have a fixed size of 80px and the middle-control has a * dynamic-size because it is configured to be resizable. In that case, * the size of the resizable control would be 340px because that is the * free space left after subtracting the size(160px) of the fixed-size controls.
*
* In addition, each sub-object can have different alignment options. * * @module gs * @class Component_StackLayoutBehavior * @extends gs.Component_LayoutBehavior * @memberof gs * @constructor ### constructor: (orientation) -> super ###* * The orientation of the stack-layout. Can be vertical or horizontal. * @property orientation * @type gs.Orientation ### @orientation = orientation || 0 ###* * @property scrollOffsetX * @type number * @protected ### @scrollOffsetX = 0 ###* * @property scrollOffsetY * @type number * @protected ### @scrollOffsetY = 0 ###* * @property contentHeight * @type number * @protected ### @contentHeight = 0 ###* * Control list-offset. * @property offset * @type number * @protected ### @offset = 0 ###* * Count of controls to process. * @property contentHeight * @type number * @protected ### @count = 0 ###* * Current x-coordinate. * @property cx * @type number * @protected ### @cx = 0 ###* * Current y-coordinate. * @property cy * @type number * @protected ### @cy = 0 ###* * Total size of all centered controls. * @property centerSize * @type number * @protected ### @centerSize = 0 ###* * Current x/y-coordinate for a centered control. * @property center * @type number * @protected ### @center = 0 ###* * Current x/y-coordinate for a bottom/right aligned control. * @property bottom * @type number * @protected ### @bottom = 0 @managementMode = 0 ###* * Initializes the layout. * * @method setup ### setup: -> @update() if @object.scrollable gs.GlobalEventManager.on "mouseWheel", => r = @object.dstRect if Rect.contains(r.x, r.y, r.width, r.height, Input.Mouse.x - @object.origin.x, Input.Mouse.y - @object.origin.y) @object.update() ###* * Updates the layout depending on its orientation. * * @method update ### update: -> super if @orientation == 0 @layoutHorizontal() else @layoutVertical() ###* * Sizes the layout to fit its content * * @method sizeToFit * @return number The content size. ### sizeToFit: -> if @orientation == 0 return @sizeToFitHorizontal() else return @sizeToFitVertical() ###* * Sizes the horizontal-layout to fit its content * * @method sizeToFitHorizontal ### sizeToFitHorizontal: -> x = 0 y = 0 rect = @object.dstRect if @object.sizeToFit for i in [@offset...@count] control = @object.subObjects[i] if !control.alignment rect.width = Math.max(x + control.margin.left + control.dstRect.width + control.margin.right, rect.width || 0) x += control.margin.left + control.dstRect.width + control.margin.right if !control.alignmentY rect.height = Math.max(y + control.margin.top + control.dstRect.height + control.margin.bottom, rect.height || 0) ###* * Sizes the vertical-layout to fit its content * * @method sizeToFitVertical ### sizeToFitVertical: -> rect = @object.dstRect if @object.sizeToFit for control in @object.subObjects rect.width = Math.max(control.dstRect.x + control.dstRect.width + control.margin.right, rect.width || 1) rect.height = Math.max(control.dstRect.y + control.dstRect.height + control.margin.bottom, rect.height || 1) ###* * Calculates the dynamic-size of a horizontal stack-layout. That size is used for * resizable-controls to let them fill all free space. It is calculated in the * following way:
*
* dynamic-size = sum-of-all-fixed-control-sizes / count-of-resizable-controls *
* * @method calculateDynamicSizeHorizontal * @return {number} The dynamic size. * @protected ### calculateDynamicSizeHorizontal: -> fixedSize = 0 dynamicCount = 0 rect = @object.dstRect for control, i in @object.subObjects if control.resizable and !control.sizeToFit dynamicCount++ else fixedSize += control.margin.left + control.dstRect.width + control.margin.right if control.alignmentX == 1 @centerSize += control.dstRect.width + control.margin.right return Math.round((rect.width - fixedSize) / dynamicCount) ###* * Calculates the dynamic-size of a vertical stack-layout. That size is used for * resizable-controls to let them fill all free space. It is calculated in the * following way:
*
* dynamic-size = sum-of-all-fixed-control-sizes / count-of-resizable-controls *
* * @method calculateDynamicSizeVertical * @return {number} The dynamic size. * @protected ### calculateDynamicSizeVertical: -> fixedSize = 0 dynamicCount = 0 for control in @object.subObjects if control.resizable and !control.sizeToFit dynamicCount++ else fixedSize += control.dstRect.height if control.alignmentY == 1 @centerSize += control.dstRect.height + control.margin.bottom return Math.round((@object.dstRect.height - fixedSize) / dynamicCount) ###* * Layouts the specified control as fixed-size control for a horizontal stack-layout. * * @method updateControlRectFixedH * @param {gs.Object_Base} control The control to update. * @protected ### updateControlRectFixedH: (control) -> rect = @object.dstRect if control.alignmentX == 0 @cx += control.margin.left control.dstRect.x = @cx @cx += control.dstRect.width + control.margin.right else if control.alignmentX == 2 @bottom += control.margin.right control.dstRect.x = (rect.x+rect.width) - control.dstRect.width - @bottom @bottom += control.dstRect.width + control.margin.left else if control.alignmentX == 1 control.dstRect.x = @center + (rect.width - @centerSize) / 2 @center += control.dstRect.width + control.margin.right if control.alignmentY == 1 control.dstRect.y = @cy + Math.round((rect.height-(control.dstRect.height+control.margin.top+control.margin.bottom)) / 2) else control.dstRect.y = @cy + control.margin.top ###* * Layouts the specified control as fixed-size control for a vertical stack-layout. * * @method updateControlRectFixedV * @param {gs.Object_Base} control The control to update. * @protected ### updateControlRectFixedV: (control) -> rect = @object.dstRect if control.alignmentY == 0 @cy += control.margin.top control.dstRect.y = @cy @cy += control.dstRect.height + control.margin.bottom control.dstRect.x = @cx + control.margin.left else if control.alignmentY == 2 @bottom += control.margin.bottom control.dstRect.y = (rect.height) - control.dstRect.height - @bottom @bottom += control.dstRect.height + control.margin.top control.dstRect.x = @cx + control.margin.left else if control.alignmentY == 1 control.dstRect.y = @center + (rect.height - @centerSize) / 2 control.dstRect.x = @cx + control.margin.left @center += control.dstRect.height + control.margin.bottom if control.alignmentX == 1 control.dstRect.x = @cx + Math.round((rect.width-control.dstRect.width) / 2) ###* * Layouts the specified control as resizable-control for a horizontal stack-layout. * That means the control will take up all free space after subtracting all * fixed-size controls. * * @method updateControlRectResizableH * @param {gs.Object_Base} control The control to update. * @protected ### updateControlRectResizableH: (control) -> dynamicSize = @calculateDynamicSizeHorizontal() control.dstRect.y = control.margin.top control.dstRect.height = @object.dstRect.height - control.margin.bottom - control.margin.top control.dstRect.x = @cx + control.margin.left control.dstRect.width = dynamicSize - control.margin.right - control.margin.left @cx += dynamicSize ###* * Layouts the specified control as resizable-control for a vertical stack-layout. * That means the control will take up all free space after subtracting all * fixed-size controls. * * @method updateControlRectResizableV * @param {gs.Object_Base} control The control to update. * @protected ### updateControlRectResizableV: (control) -> dynamicSize = @calculateDynamicSizeVertical() control.dstRect.x = control.margin.left control.dstRect.width = @object.dstRect.width - control.margin.right - control.margin.left control.dstRect.y = @cy + control.margin.top control.dstRect.height = dynamicSize - control.margin.bottom - control.margin.top @cy += dynamicSize ###* * Updates a control. * * @method updateControl * @param {gs.Object_Base} control The control to update. * @protected ### updateControl: (control) -> if @orientation == 1 if not control.clipRect? then control.clipRect = @object.clipRect if yes #!control.updated or (Rect.intersect(control.dstRect.x+@object.dstRect.x, control.dstRect.y+ @object.dstRect.y, control.dstRect.width, control.dstRect.height, @object.dstRect.x, @object.dstRect.y, @object.dstRect.width, @object.dstRect.height)) if control.needsUpdate control.needsUpdate = no control.update() control.updated = yes control.visible = yes else if control.visible control.visible = no control.update() else super(control) ###* * Layouts the sub-objects horizontally. * * @method layoutHorizontal ### layoutHorizontal: -> @bottom = 0 @center = 0 @centerSize = 0 @offset = (@object.listOffset||0) @count = @object.subObjects.length @cx = 0 @cy = 0 @sizeToFitHorizontal() i = @offset while i < @object.subObjects.length control = @object.subObjects[i] @updateControl(control) if control.disposed @object.removeObject(control) i-- else if control.resizable and !control.sizeToFit @updateControlRectResizableH(control) else @updateControlRectFixedH(control) i++ @object.clipRect?.set(@object.dstRect.x + @object.origin.x, @object.dstRect.y + @object.origin.y, @object.dstRect.width, @object.dstRect.height) return null ###* * Layouts the sub-objects vertically. * * @method layoutVertical ### layoutVertical: -> @bottom = 0 @center = 0 @centerSize = 0 @offset = (@object.listOffset||0) @count = @object.subObjects.length @cx = 0 @cy = 0 @cy -= @object.scrollOffsetY i = @offset currentY = 0 while i < @object.subObjects.length control = @object.subObjects[i] i++ continue unless control @updateControl(control) if control.disposed @object.removeObject(control) i-- else if control.resizable and !control.sizeToFit @updateControlRectResizableV(control) else @updateControlRectFixedV(control) @sizeToFitVertical() @object.clipRect?.set(@object.dstRect.x + @object.origin.x, @object.dstRect.y + @object.origin.y, @object.dstRect.width, @object.dstRect.height) return null gs.Component_StackLayoutBehavior = Component_StackLayoutBehavior
